title: Beaches
creator_credit: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners IV, Bruckheimer, South, Bonnie Bruckheimer, Bette Midler, Margaret Jennings South and Garry Marshall
brief_description: The chance meeting of two young girls from totally different backgrounds becomes the friendship of a lifetime. As they lead their separate lives, they come to realise and later rely on the strength that their friendship provides. Cast includes Bette Midler, Barbara Hershey and John Heard.
